For The First Time Ever, Rihanna Is Coming To India For A Concert & We Just Can’t Keep Calm!
For The First Time Ever, Rihanna Is Coming To India For A Concert & We Just Can’t Keep Calm!
We’re “just gonna stand there and watch you” sing, Rihanna. We just can’t wait! India, get ready for a hell of a ride because Rihanna is finally coming to India for a debut concert, and we are shook. No, seriously.
usmagazine.com
This will be the first ever time that she will be performing in India. Earlier as well, grapevine was abuzz that she would perform in India last year but then, it turned out the rumours were all false.
gofugyourself.com
This time, however, it seems the grapevine is substantial because the date has been locked apparently. It is said that Riri will perform in Mumbai on October 19. “Yes, Rihanna will be coming to India for the first time this year and will be performing in Mumbai,” an insider was quoted a source as saying by Pinkvilla.
iamflashdance.com
So ladies and gentlemen, while Beyonce might be against performing in India unless it’s a private concert for the Amabanis, Rihanna is definitely game for it. We have seen Justin Bieber, The Chainsmokers and Coldplay performing in India in last couple of years, but Rihanna will perform for the first ever time.
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
cloudinary.com
Just like Justin Bieber demanded a washing machine, refrigerator and Kerala masseuse, will Rihanna have crazy demands too? Will she throw any tantrums? Well, only time will tell.
blogspot.com
Meanwhile, we just can’t keep calm. Can you? We are listening to her songs on loop!
